register

public void register(HotComponent.Arbiter arbiter)
Register this ParagraphBox with arbiter as follows:

offer
1) GVariable by any operation, defaulting to HotComponent.LINK
2) GExpression by HotComponent.MOVE | HotComponent.COPY, defaulting to HotComponent.COPY
3) GStatement by HotComponent.MOVE | HotComponent.COPY, defaulting to HotComponent.MOVE
4) Typed by HotComponent.COPY

receive
1) GVariable by HotComponent.MOVE | HotComponent.COPY
2) GStatement by HotComponent.MOVE | HotComponent.COPY

Specified by:
register in interface HotComponent
See Also:
HotComponent.register(HotComponent.Arbiter), HotComponent#Arbiter

give

public Object give(Class type,
                   int operation)
Returns the current selection in the following manner:

· if multiple items are selected, give a HotCollection containing the selected items and the type GStatement
· if a Sentence containing a DVariable is selected, give the variable
· if a Sentence containing anything else is selected, give the sentence

Specified by:
give in interface HotComponent
Overrides:
give in class com.bitwise.decaf.editor.DListBox
Parameters:
type - the type of data the HotStation is currently interested to obtain from you. This will be one of the types you registered with the Arbiter in your register(Arbiter) method.
operation - one of SAMPLE, MOVE, COPY and LINK; see those constants for more information.
Returns:
the data requested by the HotStation

Repaint this component.

Specified by:
contentChanged in interface CodeNode.Listener
